*************************** 1. row ***************************
       Table: partner_users
Create Table: CREATE TABLE `partner_users` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userId` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `partnerCompanyId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `email` varchar(320) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `passwordHash` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `emailVerified` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0',
  `contactName` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `phone` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `partnerRole` enum('Admin','Account Manager','Sales Rep','Technical','Finance','Support','Other') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Sales Rep',
  `isActive` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '1',
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */,
  KEY `email_idx` (`email`),
  UNIQUE KEY `email` (`email`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci AUTO_INCREMENT=30001
